Key Match Events: Aaron Jones and Andries Gous made a 131-run third-wicket partnership at a run rate of 14.29
Jones hit 10 sixes in an innings in the men's T20 World Cup
Corey Anderson dismissed Navneet Dhaliwal and contributed to restricting Canada to a sub-200 total
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones described USA's style of cricket as fearless, positive, and smart
Andries Gous, a former South African player, brought experience to the chase
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones celebrated most of his sixes with animated fist pumps, which had the crowd chanting: 'USA! USA! USA!'
The win was USA's fifth successive over Canada, having beaten them 4-0 in the lead-up to their first-ever World Cup appearance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Johnson set the tone for Canada's innings with a first-ball four off Ali Khan
Nicholas Kirton dealt with Corey Anderson confidently with sixes off full-tosses
Harmeet Singh had Johnson toe-ending a catch to mid-off for 23 off 16 balls
